verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Praise waiteth for Thee, O Lord
Praise waiteth for Thee
Praise waiteth for Thee, O Lord
Waiteth for Thee in Zion.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Thou are worthy of praise, O Lord
Thou are worthy of praise
Thou are worthy of praise, O Lord
Worthy of praise in Zion.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Who so offereth praise O Lord
Glorifieth Thee
Who so offereth praise O Lord
Glorifies Thee in Zion
